category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_journal_catia
preference.preference_description: Set the CATIA_journal_catia Teamcenter preference to YES to activate the catia_trace file creation in the WORK_DIR/tmp directory for each macro launched. Set this variable to false to prevent the catia_trace file from being activated.
